fields.name: Rapid Drinker
fields.desc: Through a lifestyle of hard, competitive drinking, youâ€™ve learned how to quaff drinks at an incredibly accelerated pace. You gain the following benefits:
fields.effects_desc_json: ["* You can drink a potion as a Bonus action, instead of as an action.", "* You have advantage on any saving throws triggered by ingesting an alcoholic or dangerous substance."]
